name: Godot "How to" Tutorial app + mini game
name_original: Godot "How to" Tutorial app + mini game
description:
If you are new to Godot, like many are nowadays, it really helps to have 'fast help' handy when your code is driving you bonkers 😳

I created this FREE app to explain the 3 different bodies and a mini game with scroll down menus, a mini game, and included 'gdscripts' for people who need a 'motion' script to get their Kinematic characters moving asap!

2 code sample screenshots have been provided and you can use at your disposal.

Hope it helps! 💥
